item.title: Troubleshooting CyberPower PowerPanel issues in Linux
item.description: I have a CyberPower BRG1350AVRLCD at home and I’ve just connected it to a new device. However, the pwrstat command doesn’t retrieve any useful data on the new system: # pwrstat -status The UPS information shows as following: Current UPS status: State........................ Normal Power Supply by.............. Utility Power Last Power Event............. None I disconnected the USB cable and ran pwrstat again. Same output. I disconnected power from the UPS itself and ran pwrstat again.
